articles.title: Nigeria sees one of worst mass abductions as 315 taken from school - BBC
articles.description: The kidnapping comes amid a surge of attacks by armed groups in the African nation.
articles.content:
Chris Ewokor,BBC Africa, in Abuja, and 
St Mary's School, in Niger state, was attacked in the early hours of Friday morning

articles.author: Emmy Sasipornkarn
articles.title: G20 adopts declaration despite US boycott - DW
articles.description: It is unusual for world leaders to adopt a declaration at the start of the G20. Officials from G20 summit host South Africa said Washington had pressured them not to adopt a declaration in its absence.
articles.content:
World leaders attending a Group of 20 (G20) leaders' summit in South Africa on Saturday adopted a declaration addressing global challenges despite opposition from the United States.
The move broke w… [+3617 chars]
